description: This file defines the main layout component and routing logic for a Remix-based React application named 'Simple Notes'. It includes imports from Remix, sets document meta and links (like fonts and stylesheets), provides a loader for authentication, defines the application's layout including a navigation bar, and handles logout functionality.

classes.name: React.ReactNode
classes.description: Type for React nodes used as children in components.

methods.name: links
methods.description: Returns an array of link objects for preconnecting to Google Fonts and linking to the stylesheet.

methods.name: meta
methods.description: Provides meta tags for the document, including title and description.

methods.name: loader
methods.description: Fetches user authentication info from the request to determine if the user is logged in.

methods.name: Layout
methods.description: React component that defines the HTML structure including head meta tags, links, and body contents like children components.

methods.name: App
methods.description: Main React component that renders the navigation bar, outlet for nested routes, and a floating action button for creating notes when on '/notes' routes.

methods.name: action
methods.description: Handles POST request to log out the user by clearing the auth cookie and redirecting to login page.
